        public TokenManager()

    • Method Detail

      • sendTokenByEmail

        public void sendTokenByEmail​(Token token,
                             String recipient)
                      throws javax.mail.MessagingException
        Finalize initialization of the token and send it to the recipient.

        As the plain token is not stored in the database, the token is regenerated in this method.

        Parameters:
        token - the token to send
        recipient - recipient email address
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException - if sending the message fails

      • consume

        public Token consume​(Long id,
                     String plainToken)
        Consume the token
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the token to consume
        plainToken - the plain secret token as sent by e-mail
        Returns:
        the consumed token
        Throws:
        HttpErrorMessage - notFound if the token does not exist;
        badRequest if token does not match;
        authenticationRequired if token requires authentication but current user is not

      • requestEmailAddressVerification

        public void requestEmailAddressVerification​(LocalAccount account,
                                            boolean failsOnError)
        Send a "Please verify your email address" message.
        Parameters:
        account - account to verify
        failsOnError - if false, silent SMTP error
        Throws:
        HttpErrorMessage - smtpError if there is a SMPT error AND failsOnError is set to true messageError if the message contains errors (eg. malformed addresses)

      • consumeVerifyAccountToken

        public boolean consumeVerifyAccountToken​(LocalAccount account)
        Consume the local account verification token
        Parameters:
        account - the account related to the token
        Returns:
        true if the token can be consumed

      • sendResetPasswordToken

        public void sendResetPasswordToken​(LocalAccount account,
                                   boolean failsOnError)
        Send a "Click here the reset your password" message.
        Parameters:
        account - The account whose password is to be reset
        failsOnError - if false, silent SMTP error
        Throws:
        HttpErrorMessage - smtpError if there is a SMPT error AND failsOnError is set to true messageError if the message contains errors (eg. malformed addresses)

      • consumeResetPasswordToken

        public boolean consumeResetPasswordToken​(LocalAccount account)
        Consume the given reset password login.
        Parameters:
        account - the account related to the token
        Returns:
        true if the token can be consumed

      • sendMembershipInvitation

        public TeamMember sendMembershipInvitation​(Project project,
                                           String recipient)
        Send invitation to join the project team to the recipient.
        Parameters:
        project - the project to join
        recipient - email address to send invitation to
        Returns:
        the pending teamMember of null if none was sent

      • deleteInvitationsByTeamMember

        public void deleteInvitationsByTeamMember​(TeamMember teamMember)
        Delete all invitations linked to the team member
        Parameters:
        teamMember - the team member for which we delete all invitations

      • consumeInvitationToken

        public boolean consumeInvitationToken​(TeamMember teamMember)
        Consume the invitation token
        Parameters:
        teamMember - the team member related to the token
        Returns:
        true if the token can be consumed

      • sendModelSharingToken

        public InstanceMaker sendModelSharingToken​(Project model,
                                           String recipient)
        Send a model sharing token to register the project as a model to use

        If the token does not exist yet, create it and link to it a new pending instance maker.

        Parameters:
        model - the id of the model
        recipient - the address to send the sharing token to
        Returns:
        the pending instance maker

      • consumeModelSharingToken

        public boolean consumeModelSharingToken​(InstanceMaker instanceMaker)
        Consume the model sharing token
        Parameters:
        instanceMaker - the instance maker related to the token
        Returns:
        true if the token can be consumed

      • getNotExpiredToken

        public Token getNotExpiredToken​(Long id)
        Fetch token with given id from DAO. If it's outdated, it will be destroyed and null will be returned
        Parameters:
        id - id of the token
        Returns:
        token if it exists and is not outdated, null otherwise
